main_definition: To officially register or sign up for a program, course, institution, or membership.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Joining an educational institution as a student
meanings_and_examples.example: John enrolled in the university to pursue his degree.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Registering for or signing up for a course or program
meanings_and_examples.example: She decided to take Spanish classes and enrolled at the local language school.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Enrolling in an insurance plan or policy
meanings_and_examples.example: They decided to enroll their newborn baby in a health insurance plan.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Registering for a contest, competition, or event
meanings_and_examples.example: The team was excited to be officially enrolled in the annual tennis tournament.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Becoming a member of an organization or group
meanings_and_examples.example: After attending several meetings and events, he finally decided to enroll as a member at the local gym.
